  • Constructor Details

    • Quest

      public Quest(int questCategory, double healthCost, int cashReward, int armorReward)
      Creates a new instance of a quest with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      questCategory - The category of hero required to complete the quest.
      healthCost - The amount of health the hero must spend to complete the quest.
      cashReward - The amount of cash reward for completing the quest.
      armorReward - The amount of armor reward for completing the quest.

  • Method Details

    • complete

      public void complete(Hero hero, Guild guild) throws Exception
      Completes the quest with the specified hero and guild.
      Parameters:
      hero - The hero completing the quest.
      guild - The guild completing the quest.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the hero dies during the quest.
